ingredients.ingredient: 2 (3.9 ounce) packages instant chocolate pudding mix
1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed
3 (1.4 ounce) bars chocolate covered English toffee

cookingTips: Prepare the brownie layer first and allow to cool completely before adding pudding layer
Crush the toffee bars just before assembly to maintain their crispy texture
This dessert can be made a day ahead and refrigerated covered
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This layered dessert combines multiple chocolate textures. How would you ensure each layer sets properly before adding the next?
